topics.title: Introduction
topics.description: Overview of Visual Studio Code editor
points: VS Code is a free, open-source code editor

topics.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
points: Ctrl+K Ctrl+0: Fold all functions in a file (level 0)
Ctrl+K Ctrl+J: Unfold all functions in a file
Ctrl+K Ctrl+1: Fold to level 1 (nested functions)

topics.title: Code Folding
points: Fold All: Collapse all code blocks
Unfold All: Expand all code blocks

topics.title: Extensions
topics.description: Popular VS Code extensions for development
points: Language Support: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C++
Theme Extensions: Dark themes, light themes, custom themes
Git Extensions: GitLens, Git Graph, Git History
Debugging: Debugger extensions for various languages
IntelliSense: Enhanced code completion and suggestions
Snippets: Code snippets for faster development
Productivity: Auto-rename tag, Bracket pair colorizer

topics.title: Built-in Features
topics.description: Core features built into VS Code
points: Debugging: Built-in debugger for multiple languages
Search and Replace: Advanced search capabilities
Code Navigation: Go to definition, find references

topics.title: Workspace Management
points: Workspace: Collection of folders and settings
Workspace Trust: Security for untrusted folders

topics.title: Git Integration
topics.description: Version control with Git in VS Code
points: Source Control Panel: Git operations interface
Branch Management: Switch and create branches
Staging Changes: Add files to staging area

topics.title: Customization
topics.description: Customizing VS Code for personal preferences
points: Launch Configurations: Debug and run setups

topics.title: Productivity Features
points: Find and Replace: Advanced search and replace
Symbol Search: Find functions, classes, variables

topics.title: Language Support
topics.description: Programming language support in VS Code
points: Java: Maven, Gradle, and Spring Boot support
Rust: Language server and cargo support

topics.title: Best Practices
topics.description: Recommended practices for VS Code usage
points: Use appropriate extensions for your language
Use workspace settings for project consistency
Use integrated terminal for development tasks
Regularly update VS Code and extensions
